script.speaker: Zara
script.text: Hey, welcome to the Interdimensional Radio!

script.speaker: Milo
script.text: Hold up, did you just say 'interdimensional'??

script.speaker: Zara
script.text: Yep! We're broadcasting from the 7th galaxy—

script.speaker: Luna
script.text: —and I just tuned in from my coffee mug!

script.speaker: Milo
script.text: Seriously? My cat just turned into a hologram!

script.speaker: Zara
script.text: Okay, okay, focus—here's the wow moment:

script.speaker: Luna
script.text: We just opened a portal to the snack dimension!

script.speaker: Zara
script.text: If you want more of this madness, smash that follow—
